goal.core.runtime

Interface RuntimeEventObserver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Observer<RuntimeManager<?,?>,RuntimeEvent>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EclipseEventObserver

    public interface RuntimeEventObserver
extends Observer<RuntimeManager<?,?>,RuntimeEvent>
    interface to observe events from the RuntimeManager.
    Author:
    W.Pasman 11nov2013

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void eventOccured(RuntimeManager<?,?> source, RuntimeEvent evt)
      This function is called when a RuntimeEvent occurs.

    • Method Detail

      • eventOccured

        void eventOccured(RuntimeManager<?,?> source,
                RuntimeEvent evt)
        This function is called when a RuntimeEvent occurs. To be implemented by the observer.
        Specified by:
        eventOccured in interface Observer<RuntimeManager<?,?>,RuntimeEvent>
        Parameters:
        source - the RuntimeManager creating the event
        evt - the RuntimeEvent that happened.
